sentences.sContent: ...giant submarines able to travel at high speeds underwater.
sentences.sCn: …能在水下高速行驶的巨型潜艇。

sentences.sContent: Some stretches of beach are completely underwater at high tide.
sentences.sCn: 有些沙滩在涨潮时会完全被水淹没。

phrases.pCn: n. 水下爆炸，水中爆炸
水声；水中音；水中声音；水声设备
水下摄影机，水下照相机

trans.tranOther: Something that exists or happens underwater exists or happens below the surface of the ocean, a river, or a lake

trans.tranCn: 水下的；水下使用的；水下行动的
trans.tranOther: below the surface of an area of water, or able to be used there
